_meta.source: NBA Trade History Research - Deep Analysis

tree.name: Mikal Bridges
tree.tradeDescription: NYK acquires Bridges for massive package: Bogdanovic, Diakite, Milton + 4 first-round picks + 1 pick swap + 1 second-round pick
tree.note: Villanova product, elite 3&D wing, ironman streak. One of the biggest trade packages in NBA history.

assetsGivenUp.name: Bojan Bogdanovic
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Knicks acquire Bogdanovic from Detroit for Alec Burks + Nerlens Noel + draft considerations

assetsGivenUp.name: Alec Burks
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Signed as unrestricted free agent from Golden State Warriors
assetsGivenUp.note: 1-year $6M deal. Former NYK player returning. Free agent = no assets given up

assetsGivenUp.name: Nerlens Noel
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Acquired from Thunder for Tony Bradley + Austin Rivers + 2024 2nd

assetsGivenUp.name: Terrance Ferguson
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Signed as free agent from OKC Thunder
assetsGivenUp.note: Free agent signing = no assets given up

assetsGivenUp.name: Austin Rivers
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Signed as unrestricted free agent from Houston Rockets
assetsGivenUp.note: 1-year minimum deal. Free agent = no assets given up

assetsGivenUp.name: 2024 Second-Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: NYK's own 2024 second-round pick sent to OKC in Nerlens Noel trade (2021). Subsequently traded by OKC.

assetsGivenUp.name: Shake Milton
assetsGivenUp.note: Signed and immediately included in Bridges trade as salary filler

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 Second-Round Pick (BKN own)
assetsGivenUp.note: Brooklyn's own 2025 second-round pick sent to BKN in Bridges trade

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 First-Round Pick (NYK own, conditional)
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: NYK's own first-round pick, completely unprotected
assetsGivenUp.note: Extremely valuable asset - no protection whatsoever

assetsGivenUp.name: 2027 First-Round Pick (unprotected)
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: NYK's own first-round pick, completely unprotected
assetsGivenUp.note: Far future pick with significant value

assetsGivenUp.name: 2029 First-Round Pick (unprotected)
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: NYK's own first-round pick, completely unprotected

assetsGivenUp.name: 2031 First-Round Pick (unprotected)
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: NYK's own first-round pick, completely unprotected
assetsGivenUp.note: Latest pick ever traded at time of deal - decade out

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 First-Round Pick (via MIL, protected 1-4)
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Originally Milwaukee's pick, acquired via Houston in Damian Lillard facilitator deal
assetsGivenUp.note: Complex 3-team trade chain involving Lillard to MIL

assetsGivenUp.name: Milwaukee 2025 First (original)
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Acquired from Milwaukee in Damian Lillard 3-team trade (NYK was facilitator)
assetsGivenUp.note: NYK helped facilitate Lillard trade to acquire this asset

assetsGivenUp.name: Jusuf Nurkic (salary match)
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: NYK took on salary to facilitate Lillard-to-Milwaukee trade
assetsGivenUp.note: NYK briefly held Nurkic contract before rerouting to POR

assetsGivenUp.name: Salary Cap Space
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: NYK used available cap space to facilitate trade

assetsGivenUp.name: 2028 Pick Swap Rights
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: BKN gains right to swap 2028 first-round picks with NYK
assetsGivenUp.note: Additional optionality for Brooklyn in the deal
